DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study evaluate effect nomegestrol acetate-estradiol ( NOMAC-E2 ) combine oral contraceptive ( COC ) ovarian function .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Ovarian Function Combined Oral Contraceptive NOMAC-E2 Compared COC Containing DRSP/EE ( 292003 ) ( COMPLETED ) ( P05723 )
DOC.criteria: Willing use COC least 6 cycle . 18 35 year age screening . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) > /= 17 < /= 35 . Good physical mental health . Willing use condom sole contraceptive method screen cycle 1 posttreatment cycle . Willing give inform consent . Contraindications contraceptive steroid ( general ) . Additional contraindication ( renal , hepatic adrenal insufficiency ) . Breastfeeding . Present use ( use within 2 month prior start trial medication ) follow drug : phenytoin , barbiturate , primidone , carbamazepine , oxcarbazepine , topiramate , felbamate , rifampicin , nelfinavir , ritonavir , griseofulvin , ketoconazole , sex steroid ( pre post treatment contraceptive method ) herbal remedy contain Hypericum perforatum ( St. John 's Wort ) . Administration investigational drug and/or participation another clinical trial within 2 month prior start trial medication trial period . Abnormal cervical smear screening , documentation abnormal smear perform within 6 month screen . Clinically relevant abnormal laboratory result screen judge investigator .
